meanings.sent5: The ultramicroscopical world of nanotechnology is full of wonders waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to objects or particles that are too small to be seen with a standard microscope.
meanings.sent1: The ultramicroscopical bacteria required specialized equipment for detection.
meanings.sent2: The ultramicroscopical nature of the virus made it difficult to study.
meanings.sent3: The ultramicroscopical size of the ants made them perfect for a miniature circus.
meanings.sent4: Her ultramicroscopical attention to detail impressed her boss.
meanings.sent5: The ultramicroscopical world of quantum physics is mind-boggling.
